var FilterToken = func(ctx *context.Context) {
Â  Â  ctx.Output.Header("Access-Control-Allow-Origin", "*")
Â  Â  logs.Info("current router path is ", ctx.Request.RequestURI)
Â  Â  Â  Â  ctx.Request.RequestURI != "/v1/users/login" &&
Â  Â  Â  Â  ctx.Request.RequestURI != "/v1/users/register" &&
Â  Â  Â  Â  ctx.Request.RequestURI != "/v1/users/tocken/account"&& {
Â  Â  Â  Â  if ctx.Input.Header("Authorization") == "" {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  logs.Error("without token, unauthorized !!")
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ctx.ResponseWriter.WriteHeader(401)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ctx.ResponseWriter.Write([]byte("no permission"))
Â  Â  Â  Â  } else {
